snippet.title: "She Deserves Jail Time" Johnny Depp Speaks On Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp Reveals What He Think Should Happen To Amber Heard For What She Did.

✅ Subscribe & HIT that notification bell for more Celebrity Content!

Are we finally witnessing the curtains being lowered on Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's highly publicized four-year-long showdown? Ever since this legal battle has started, Johnny Depp has mainly been the one suffering major blow after blow, as he got fired from several large-scale projects, and nearly had his career ruined for life. But unexpectedly, a number of people have recently started to break their silence and started offering proof backing him up, including Disney.

The biggest mass media company reportedly rehired Depp for his mega-popular role Captain Jack Sparrow in the upcoming Pirates of the Caribbean movie. In a turn of events, Amber Heard is now the one on the receiving end of the negativity. The ex-Aquaman star has recently gotten replaced as “Mera” who will now be played by Emilia Clarke in Aquaman 2. But what does Johnny have to say about all this? Does he feel pitty, or is he excited that things are finally going his way?

#AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp
tags: is johnny depp in pirates of the caribbean 6
is johnny depp back in pirates of the caribbean
is johnny depp rehired by disney
is amber heard going to jail
what will happen to johnny depp
